scripts.deploy: npm run build:config && sls deploy && npm run update:all
scripts.jest: PARTNER_QUEUE_URL=partner.com RESULT_QUEUE_URL=result.com ERROR_QUEUE_URL=error.com VERSION=v1 skripts jest
scripts.start: cd scripts && tsc && node genEvent.js && node --inspect server.js
scripts.test: npm run build:config && npm run lint && npm run jest && sls package
scripts.update:all: cd scripts && tsc && node updateAll.js && cd - && npm run clean
